product_name: Dr. Scholl's Blister Treatment Cushions - Package of 8
long_description: Apply 1 of these nearly invisible Dr. Scholl's Blister Treatment cushions to help prevent or heal painful blisters. Thin, flexible pads conform to the heel and other areas to cushion and protect from friction and pressure. Comes in individual sterile packages; can be applied to open blisters. Package of 8 Dr. Scholl's Blister Treatment cushions.
short_description: Apply 1 of these nearly invisible Dr. Scholl's Blister Treatment cushions to help prevent or heal painful blisters.
